public class GameObject extends Object implements Updatable, Comparable<GameObject>
The name of this class is quite explanatory.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(GameObject o)
      Compares two objects by there layer numbers. Is used for sorting the objects for drawing them in the correct order.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<GameObject>
      Parameters:
      o - the object to be compared.
